name: Taare Zameen Par
description:
THIS GAME IS MADE IN 4 DAYS FOR GAME JAM!!

Taare Zameen Par is an endless hyper-casual educational game.

Designers: Preetish, Mann Devani

Programmers: Mann Devani, Adnan Yousuf

Art(Pixel Art): Rishi G Menon, Mann Devani,  Adnan Yousuf

Music/Soundtrack: Through Online, using proper license music.

THE CONCEPT...?                                    

Tare Zameen Par is not just an educational game. It's a memento of the movie Taree Zameen Par. It's mainly targeted around kids to increase their mental knowledge by making them love maths, through the perspective of fun gaming. 

As maths is a most crucial subject in our life it is a need to learn it, but conventional ways make maths boring, and that's the reason Taare Zameen Par breaks this type of learning and helps you to learn the beginner mathematics such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

[The Game Concept is changing with new updates and mechanics!]

CONTROLS:

🔸Touch anywhere to control the Spaceship.

🔸Touch the Planets with the Spaceship to grab it.

🔸Grab all the Planets to Sun to progress the level.

DISCLAIMER?

This Game is Developed only in 4 days, that's why it can have bugs and glitches inside it. You can comment and give us feedback about it to make this game more fun to play.

We are working on the Play Store Version with fix glitches bugs and new features, so stay tuned for that. 

Thank you so much! I am planning the full game on this late year or other version of it!
